headerDisplay: The **Hejhome** plugin allows you to control Hejhome Devices. To get started link your Hejhome account. 1. Download Hejhome App on App Store or Google Play Store. 2. Register a Hejhome account and log in into your account. 3. Input your `Email` and `Password` into the parameters below.
footerDisplay:
Please raise any issues on our [project page](https://github.com/Hejhome/homebridge-hejhome/issues).

If you would like to have other Hejhome Devices added to this plugin fill out [Feature Request Form](https://github.com/Hejhome/homebridge-hejhome/issues/new?assignees=&labels=&template=feature_request.md).
